Text: wtf? it's zipped pdf file, if you read it you will realize it's real script.
have you seen a virus in a pdf file ever?

But I was wondering, is this really James Cameron's Avatar script? And is it free of viruses?

I am going to watch the movie tomorrow anyway, but it would have been fun to read the script too :-D
it's ordinary pdf file WITHOUT any virus (jscript or any other)
its the real deal guys. read about 50 pages of it last night. like reading an adventure novel
